description: ELDEN RING Shadow of the Erdtree releases soon, and there's a patch out but sadly this has been causing issues for players on Steam Deck and desktop Linux.
title: ELDEN RING Shadow of the Erdtree DLC update causing problems on Steam Deck / Linux

description: Another update to Proton Experimental landed today, June 20th, from Valve bringing some game fixes across desktop Linux and Steam Deck.
title: Proton Experimental gets fixes for Helldivers 2, Ghost of Tsushima and more

description: Here's another interesting looking indie game for you to follow with Wax Heads, a cosy-punk slice-of-life narrative sim about managing a struggling record store.
title: Wax Heads is a cosy-punk slice-of-life narrative sim about managing a struggling record store

description: VR fans rejoice! The GNOME project has finally pulled in DRM lease protocol support today, something required for getting VR under GNOME on Wayland working well.
title: DRM lease protocol support finally merged for GNOME Wayland - great for VR fans

description: I was already a ridiculously big fan of Selaco, with it being one of the best retro-styled shooters (and just...shooters in general) I've played in forever and now the Bullet Time X mod has just made it even more amazing.
title: Selaco now has a Bullet Time mod inspired by Max Payne and it's amazing

description: A bit of a blending of Curious Expedition and Vagrus - The Riven Realms we have here with Sandwalkers, a roguelike turn-based exploration game where you guide a caravan across hostile environments.
title: Guide a caravan of adventurers through hostile environments in Sandwalkers

description: Taking Star Fox and putting the survivor-like spin on it with lots of upgrades and repeat runs, Whisker Squadron: Survivor has levelled up with a new campaign mode that's really worth a go.
title: Star Fox like shooter Whisker Squadron: Survivor just added a campaign mode to blast through

description: Death Road to Canada is a name I haven't heard for quite a while. A co-op action post-zombie apocalypse road trip game and it just had a big update for 2024.
title: Death Road to Canada gets a major 2024 upgrade with new events, characters, perks and more
